db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes for unit testing Qt applications and libraries.

db:article.db:para: Provides classes for unit testing Qt applications and libraries.

db:listitem.db:para: The QTest namespace contains all the functions and declarations that are related to Qt Test.
The QSignalSpy class enables introspection of signal emission.
The QTouchEventSequence class is used to simulate a sequence of touch events.
The QTestEventList class provides a list of GUI events.
